title: VILLAGE / SHACK DOOR
description: The shack door dialogue, if you have gained access to the shack where you can sleep. It's locked until you get it from the Washerwoman.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm afraid we don't have time for..."
dialogueTree.english: "I'm afraid we don't have time for rest stops right now, officer. We should really get back to the Whirling."
dialogueTree.polish: „Obawiam się, że nie mamy czasu na odpoczynek, oficerze. Naprawdę powinniśmy wracać do Whirling”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Баюся, што ў нас няма часу на адпачынак, афіцэры. Мы сапраўды павінны вяртацца ў Whirling".

dialogueTree.title: Shack Door: "It's getting cold this late in the..."
dialogueTree.english: It's getting cold this late in the night. Time to call it a day.
dialogueTree.polish: O tej godzinie noc robi się już zimna. Czas iść do łóżka.
dialogueTree.belarusian: У гэты час ноч становіцца ўжо халоднай. Час ісці ў ложак.

Alternate1.english: It's getting late and it's raining. Time to call it a day.
Alternate1.polish: Robi się późno, w dodatku pada. Czas iść do łóżka.
Alternate1.belarusian: Становіцца позна, да таго ж ідзе дождж. Час ісці ў ложак.

Alternate2.english: It's getting late and it's snowing. Time to call it a day.
Alternate2.polish: Robi się późno, w dodatku pada śnieg. Czas iść do łóżka.
Alternate2.belarusian: Становіцца позна, да таго ж ідзе снег. Час ісці ў ложак.

links.title: You: ""Good night, Kim." (Send him away f..."
links.english: "Good night, Kim." (Send him away for the night.)
links.polish: „Dobranoc, Kim”. (Odeślij go na dziś do domu).

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good night, officer. We'll meet in..."
links.english: "Good night, officer. We'll meet in front of the shack in the morning."
links.polish: „Dobranoc, oficerze. Spotkamy się rano przed chatą”.

dialogueTree.title: Shack Door: "The door has seen better days -- th..."
dialogueTree.english: The door has seen better days -- the layer of paint has started to peel off due to the salt and wind from the sea. Even the lock looks slightly rusted.
dialogueTree.polish: Drzwi pamiętają lepsze czasy – warstwa farby zaczęła schodzić pod wpływem działania wiatru i morskiej soli. Nawet zamek wygląda na lekko zardzewiały.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Дзверы памятаюць лепшыя часы — пласт фарбы пачаў адыходзіць пад уплывам ветру і марской солі. Нават замок выглядае злёгку падаржавелым.

links.title: You: "Unlock the shack door with the key."
links.english: Unlock the shack door with the key.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'll be sleeping in my room in the..."
links.english: "I'll be sleeping in my room in the Whirling. We'll meet in front of the shack in the morning."
links.polish: „Przenocuję w swoim pokoju w Whirling. Spotkamy się rano przed chatą”.
links.belarusian: "Пераначую ў сваім пакоі ў Whirling. Сустрэнемся раніцай перад хаткай".

Alternate1.english: "It's getting late. I'll let you sweep this place on your own. I'm sure you can handle the washerwoman... I'll be sleeping in my room in the Whirling. We'll meet in front of the shack in the morning."
Alternate1.polish: „Robi się późno. Przenocuj tutaj sam. Na pewno poradzisz sobie z praczką... Ja przenocuję w swoim pokoju w Whirling. Spotkamy się rano przed chatą”.
Alternate1.belarusian: «Становіцца позна. Застанься тут начаваць сам. Ты дакладна справішся з пральнай машынай... Я пераначую ў сваёй пакоі ў Whirling. Сустрэнемся раніцай перад хатай».

links.title: You: ""I'll sleep here then. See you in t..."
links.english: "I'll sleep here then. See you in the morning." (Keep turning the key.)
links.polish: „Ja w takim razie prześpię się tutaj. Do zobaczenia rano”. (Przekręcaj klucz dalej).
links.belarusian: "Тады я тут пераначую. Да сустрэчы раніцай". (Працягвай паварочваць ключ).

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good night." He smiles: "And try n..."
links.english: "Good night." He smiles: "And try not to break the case without me."
links.polish: „Dobranoc” – uśmiecha się. „I postaraj się nie rozwiązać tej sprawy beze mnie”.
links.belarusian: "Добранач," — усміхаецца. "І паспрабуй не разгадаць гэтую справу без мяне."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'll wait outside to give you some..."
links.english: "I'll wait outside to give you some time and privacy to check out your new living arrangement. But just so you know..."
links.polish: „Zaczekam na zewnątrz, abyś miał trochę czasu i prywatności podczas sprawdzania swojego nowego lokum. Ale dla twojej informacji...”
links.belarusian: "Пачакаў на вуліцы, каб у цябе было крыху часу і прыватнасці падчас праверкі свайго новага жытла. Але для тваёй інфармацыі..."

Alternate1.english: "I'll wait outside to give you some time and privacy to check out your new living arrangement and look for any signs of Ruby. But just so you know..."
Alternate1.polish: „Zaczekam na zewnątrz, abyś miał trochę czasu i prywatności podczas sprawdzania swojego nowego lokum i szukania jakichkolwiek śladów Ruby. Ale dla twojej informacji...”
Alternate1.belarusian: «Пачакаю на вуліцы, каб ты меў крыху часу і прыватнасці падчас праверкі свайго новага жытла і пошуку якіх-небудзь слядоў Рубі. Але для тваёй інфармацыі...»

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""After we're done with the day, I'l..."
links.english: "After we're done with the day, I'll still be staying in the Whirling-in-Rags for the night. We'll meet in front of the shack in the morning."
links.polish: „Gdy zakończymy na dziś pracę, wrócę do swojego pokoju w Whirling-in-Rags. Spotkamy się rano przed chatą”.
links.belarusian: "Калі мы скончым працу на сёння, я вярнуся ў свой пакой у Whirling-in-Rags. Сустрэнемся раніцай перад хатай".

links.title: Shack Door: "The key turns with a satisfying cli..."
links.english: The key turns with a satisfying click. You can enter the shack now.
links.polish: Klucz przekręca się z przyjemnym kliknięciem. Możesz teraz wejść do chaty.
links.belarusian: Ключ паварочваецца з прыемным клiкам. Цяпер вы можаце ўвайсці ў хату.
